overview.title: Overview

blocks.text: Overview

overview.text:
I will transform The Company’s vision into an engaging content that will help your customers connect, understand and fall in love with your company. The content shall include blog posts (weekly), social media posts (daily) and a complete overhaul of your company’s website communications.
The goal of this project is to improve our communication style to create a more human and engaging brand experience, which will decrease customer complaints and help tickets.

Milestones
Assuming that we have all necessary materials ready, here are the suggested milestones:

terms.title: Terms

blocks.text: Terms

terms.text:
1. This proposal is valid until {{proposal.expireDate}}.
  2. Payment structure: 50% upfront, 50% after approval of the final work. Payment via Paypal or bank transfer.
  3. Resources needed for the design, such as fonts, stock photos, and icons, are not included in the prices above. Those will be paid for by the client, and the right to use them shall be theirs.
  4. Additional work for components that appear in the scope of work will be charged [termsrate] per hour (e.g. beyond the number of revisions described).
  5. New components that are not described in the scope of work will be assessed in a new estimate.
  6. Business day count starts only after the client provides all resources requested, such as images, contact details, etc.
  7. Usage rights: After the work is completed and payment has been received, the client will own the rights to the design.
  8. In the case of project cancellation after the work has started, the client will pay for the relative part of the work.

blocks.text: This proposal is valid until {{proposal.expireDate}}.
Payment structure: 50% upfront, 50% after approval of the final work. Payment via Paypal or bank transfer.
Resources needed for the design, such as fonts, stock photos, and icons, are not included in the prices above. Those will be paid for by the client, and the right to use them shall be theirs.
Additional work for components that appear in the scope of work will be charged [termsrate] per hour (e.g. beyond the number of revisions described).
New components that are not described in the scope of work will be assessed in a new estimate.
Business day count starts only after the client provides all resources requested, such as images, contact details, etc.
Usage rights: After the work is completed and payment has been received, the client will own the rights to the design.
In the case of project cancellation after the work has started, the client will pay for the relative part of the work.

whatsnext.title: What's Next

blocks.text: What's Next

whatsnext.text:
I will be happy to answer any question regarding this proposal. You can reach me at my phone or at ashiq@goprospero.com.
Once you approve this proposal, we will set up a meeting to further discuss details, dates and milestones.
Once the first payment is in, and the resources needed arrive, we can start the actual work.
